title: Jennifer Aniston Wants To Work With Her 'Friends' Co-Stars. Universe, Make It Happen Already!
text:
Jennifer Aniston Wants To Work With Her 'Friends' Co-Stars. Universe, Make It Happen Already!

Jennifer Aniston Wants To Work With Her 'Friends' Co-Stars. Universe, Make It Happen Already!

If there's one collective wish that every Friends fan has today, it's to see the gang reunite.

The co-actors from Friends have come together on several occasions, but never in full-attendance. Collaborations include Cox, David Schwimmer and Matthew Perry guest-starring on Lisa Kudrow's Web Therapy.

Aniston appeared on Cougar Town and Schwimmer, 52, appeared in LeBlanc's Episodes. But every Friends fan has just one question: When will we get to see them together?

Twitter

The makers have shattered all our hopes for a Friends reboot or film, but these stars have time and again expressed their desire to work together.

Jennifer Aniston too has expressed her desire. In an interview with Entertainment Tonight, Jennifer Aniston, who played Rachel Green on the hit NBC sitcom, revealed that she's always looking for ways to bring the gang back together. She said,

Don't Miss 868 SHARES 43.8 K SHARES 24.2 K SHARES 5.3 K SHARES

"We are always trying to think of something. It's just like going home. We have the best time together."

Apart from starring in one of the world's most popular sitcoms, Courteney Cox, Matt LeBlanc, David Schwimmer, Aniston and Lisa Kudrow still share a great off-screen rapport.

Like, last weekend the friends crew reunited at Courteney Cox' home for dinner. The selfie went viral on the internet for obvious reasons.

Here's hoping the big TV bosses are listening. As fans, we won't stop praying for the gang to get together and give us yet more decades of laughter.
description: Apart from starring in one of America's most popular sitcomes Friends, Courteney Cox, Matt LeBlanc, David Schwimmer, Aniston and Lisa Kudrow still share a great off-screen rapport. Like, last weekend the Friends crew reunited at Courteney Cox' home (Monica) for dinner. The selfie went viral on the internet, sending off everyone for a major meltdown!
